data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: We wish to inform you that at the meeting of Board of Directors of the Company held today i.e. 25th October, 2023, the Board, inter-alia, has considered and approved the unaudited financial results of the Company (standalone and consolidated) for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2023, declared interim dividend of Rs. 7 per share and approved issue of bonus shares in the ratio 1:1.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting - Q1 FY 2023-24
data.news_body: We wish to inform you that at the meeting of Board of Directors of the Company held today i.e. 29th July, 2023, the Board, inter-alia, has considered and approved the unaudited financial results of the Company (standalone and consolidated) for the quarter ended 30th June, 2023. The meeting commenced at 4.00 p.m. and concluded at 4.45 p.m.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting - Q1 FY 2023-24
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that at the meeting of Board of Directors of the Company held today i.e. 29th July, 2023, the Board, inter-alia, has considered and approved the unaudited financial results of the Company (standalone and consolidated) for the quarter ended 30th June, 2023.

The meeting commenced at 4.00 p.m. and concluded at 4.45 p.m.

data.caption: Results For Q4 And Year Ended March 31, 2023
data.news_body: We wish to inform you that at the meeting of Board of Directors of the Company held today i.e. 13th May 2023, the Board, inter-alia, has considered and approved the Audited Financial Results of the Company (standalone and consolidated) for quarter and year ended 31st March, 2023 and recommended a Final Dividend of Rs. 8.75/- per equity share (875% on par value Re. 1/-), subject to approval of shareholders of the Company. The meeting commenced at 9.15 a.m. and concluded at 10.15 a.m.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting - Q4 & Year Ended March 31, 2023
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that at the meeting of Board of Directors of the Company held today i.e. 13th May 2023, the Board, inter-alia, has considered and approved the Audited Financial Results of the Company (standalone and consolidated) for quarter and year ended 31st March, 2023 and recommended a Final Dividend of Rs. 8.75/- per equity share (875% on par value Re. 1/-), subject to approval of shareholders of the Company.

The meeting commenced at 9.15 a.m. and concluded at 10.15 a.m.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we are enclosing Investors' Presentation for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2022.The above said presentation is also made available on the Company's website www.sonatasoftware.com.Please take the same on record.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting - Q3 FY 2022-23
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that at the meeting of Board of Directors of the Company held today i.e. 24th January 2023, the Board, inter-alia, has considered and approved the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company (standalone and consolidated) for quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2022.

The meeting commenced at 12.45 p.m. and concluded at 02.00 p.m.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting - Q3 FY 2022-23
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that at the meeting of Board of Directors of the Company held today i.e. 24th January 2023, the Board, inter-alia, has considered and approved the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company (standalone and consolidated) for quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2022.

The meeting commenced at 12.45 p.m. and concluded at 02.00 p.m.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Sonata Software Limited has informed the Exchange about Board Meeting held on 18 October 2022 to consider financial statements (standalone and consolidated) for the quarter and half year ended 30th September 2022 and declare interim dividend of Rs. 7 per share for the financial year 2022-23.
